feed.title: Brig Lamoreaux |
feed.subtitle: Long term storage for a forgetful mind

entry.title: Starting Ubuntu Terminal
entry.content: From some reason, the menu on my Ubuntu decided to freeze on me. Fortunately I can still be productive from the command line. The only problem is my launcher for the terminal is frozen with the rest of the menus. Thanks to a quick search, I was able to use a keyboard shortcut to launch the terminal. Ctrl + Alt + t
entry.summary: From some reason, the menu on my Ubuntu decided to freeze on me. Fortunately I can still be productive from the command line. The only problem is my launcher for the terminal is frozen with the rest of the menus. Thanks to a quick search, I was able to use a keyboard shortcut to launch the terminal. Ctrl + Alt + t
